Package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.allure

Class RestClientAllureImpl

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.api.client.RestClientImpl
io.cyborgcode.roa.api.allure.RestClientAllureImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.cyborgcode.roa.api.client.RestClient
@Component public class RestClientAllureImpl extends io.cyborgcode.roa.api.client.RestClientImpl
Enhances RestClientImpl with Allure reporting capabilities.

This class logs API request and response details to Allure, attaching HTTP method, headers, body, response time, status codes, and other key request/response metadata.

    • printResponse

      Logs API response details and attaches them to Allure reports.
      Overrides:
      printResponse in class io.cyborgcode.roa.api.client.RestClientImpl
      Parameters:
      methodName - The HTTP method used for the request.
      finalUrl - The request URL.
      response - The received response.
      duration - The time taken to execute the request in milliseconds.
